section.p: The goblin-folk swarm over you. You try to put up a fight, but there are too many of them. Everything goes black...
You wake up, spluttering, face down on a beach! A wave has just soaked you.

‘Going for a swim, are we?’ asks an old woman who is gathering shells on the beach. You learn from her that a month has passed since your adventure in the faery mound, and you can remember none of it.

If you were wounded, you are now back to full Stamina. However, you realize you have lost all the money and items you were carrying. Cross them off your Adventure Sheet. Instead, you have a
